Date:   Sun Oct 16 18:42:56 2022 +0200

    WalletApplication: don't install own random number generator implementation any more
    
    The Android framework bug that made this workaround necessary was fixed in Android 4.4.
    We stopped supporting affected Android versions a long time ago. More information at
    https://android-developers.googleblog.com/2013/08/some-securerandom-thoughts.html

commit d1731db592e95ce01a90bec63a068976250d1535
Author: Andreas Schildbach <andreas.schildbach@bloq.com>
Date:   Mon Sep 12 19:44:54 2022 +0200

    SendCoinsViewModel: fix race between empty wallet and change of available balance
    
    Sending the entire balance is now indicated by setting the amount to MAX_MONEY,
    rather than to the available balance (which could change in-flight). Before this
    change, it could happen that less than the entire wallet was sent, or a too high
    amount was attempted.

commit f6513c6a034fe88db075403dda273d636c8c99ce
Author: Andreas Schildbach <andreas.schildbach@bloq.com>
Date:   Wed Nov 27 23:06:06 2019 +0100

    BlockchainService: Avoid using stopService(). Rather use stopSelf() from within the service.
    
    Using stopService() is rumored to be a cause of the dreaded
    "Context.startForegroundService() did not then call Service.startForeground()"
    exception/ANR.

commit bbad50d5440ba90873c962c25b9e521af17827a5
Author: cornwarecjp <cornwarecjp@ultimatestunts.nl>
Date:   Thu Nov 26 20:37:15 2015 +0100

    Add zlib1g package to README.
    
    The aapt program in the Android SDK needs the i386 (32-bit) version of the libz library (supplied by the zlib1g package). Since, by default, only the amd64 (64-bit) version is installed on 64-bit Ubuntu, we need to install the i386 version ourselves.

1	1	wallet/README

    Adjust fee per KB for the normal fee category.
